meta.title: Muhammad Talha Zaheer | Full Stack Developer & Cybersecurity Professional
meta.description: Short summary of your skills and experience.

personal.name: Muhammad Talha Zaheer
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & Cyber Security Professional
personal.about: Future-Focused Computer Scientist | Aspiring Cybersecurity Expert | Innovator in Technology and Digital Defense
personal.workingHours: Asynchronous-first, with dedicated availability for team sync-ups in any time zone.

experience.title: Developer
experience.description: Built Node.js automation scripts, AI-powered voice agents, and dynamic query generation system for Trinium logistics database.
achievements: Developed automation scripts using Puppeteer to streamline business workflows
Built FastAPI endpoints to fetch real-time data directly from Trinium Linked DB
Implemented voice agents with Pipecat for handling customer queries and support
Designed AI-powered query bot using Vercel AI SDK with tool calling to generate executable Trinium DB queries
Mastered Trinium DB structure to efficiently fetch and process logistics data

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Implemented web applications with integrated AI agents using Python and Node.js.
achievements: Built web applications with AI agent integration using Python and Node.js
Designed RESTful APIs and real-time communication for web-AI backends
Integrated third-party AI services and custom ML models
Optimized performance through testing, monitoring, and CI/CD pipelines
Mentored team members on AI integration best practices

experience.title: HTB Meetup Host
experience.description: Host online and on-campus cyber security events at various universities, teaching students about cyber security concepts and practices, and providing resources and opportunities to enhance their skills.
achievements: Organized cyber security workshops and events across multiple universities
Delivered sessions on security fundamentals, hands-on labs, and real-world scenarios
Provided HTB vouchers and curated resources for skill development
Mentored students on career paths and certifications
Built collaborative learning environment fostering community participation

experience.title: Course Instructor
experience.description: Developed and recorded comprehensive cyber security and penetration testing courses with 24 lectures featuring 80% practical hands-on content.
achievements: Recorded 24 lectures covering cyber security and penetration testing concepts
Designed courses with 80% practical content to provide hands-on knowledge
Created interactive learning objectives and tasks within lectures for online students
Structured curriculum to enable self-paced learning while maintaining engagement
Delivered practical pentesting and security labs for enrolled students

experience.title: Cyber Security Intern
experience.description: Gained practical hands-on experience in network security, vulnerability exploitation, and defense mechanisms including firewall configuration and penetration testing.
achievements: Configured pfSense firewall with IDS/IPS for network threat detection and prevention
Deployed Web Application Firewall (WAF) on vulnerable sites for application-level protection
Set up and configured Loki scanner for malware detection and analysis
Conducted DoS attack simulations using hping3, LOIC, and HOIC tools
Exploited shadow file vulnerabilities and demonstrated privilege escalation techniques
Performed network traffic analysis and packet inspection using Wireshark
Executed Nmap scanning and vulnerability exploitation including EternalBlue and macro-based attacks on Windows systems

education.institution: University of Management and Technology, Lahore
NAVTTC - National Vocational & Technical Training Commission

projects.title: CTF Platform
projects.shortDescription: Manage tasks, participants, and scores for competitions.
description: A CTF platform for conducting Capture The Flag competitions. Manage tasks (Docker, static files, etc.), participants, and scores (team based scoring, task based scoring) for competitions.
features: Add static files, Docker tasks, etc.
Team based scoring, task based scoring
Track the progress of the competition

projects.title: Darzee Mobile App
projects.shortDescription: Platform for connecting tailors and customers.
description: A mobile app for connecting tailors and customers. Users can order custom clothes and track the progress of their orders. find nearest tailors and get quotes for their services.
features: Track the progress of the orders
Find nearest tailors and get quotes for their services

projects.title: POS System
description: A POS System for a Restaurant. It allows the restaurant to manage their menu items, deals, and orders with printing receipts and storing data on a server.
features: Manage menu items, deals, and orders
CRUD waiters, tables, discounts, categories, and more

projects.title: Waiter App
description: A Waiter App integrated with POS System for a Restaurant. It allows waiters to take orders from customers and send them to the POS System with printing receipts and storing data on a server with realtime updates.
features: Store data on a server with realtime updates

projects.title: POS System (Offline)
description: A POS System for a Bakery. It allows the bakery to manage their menu items, deals, and orders with printing receipts and storing data locally.
features: Manage menu items, deals, and orders

projects.title: File Sync System
projects.shortDescription: C++ App for storing and syncing files in local network.
description: A C++ App for storing and syncing files in local network. It allows users to store and sync files between multiple devices in a local network without internet connection.
features: Can load million of files in AVL tree for fast access
Both client and server applications using WinSock library
Sync files between multiple devices in local network
Server handles each client in a separate thread for concurrent connections
